amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to boost the Army Corps' Aquatic Nuisance Species Research Program by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Nolan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
